suite.name: Selenium Grid Demo In Parallel For Multiple Environments

test-method.name: testForSecondEnvironment
test-method.description: Show off Deep Test Using the Firefox Web Browser on Windows (2).

exception.message: Could not start Selenium session: ERROR: Could not find any remote control providing the 'Firefox on Windows' environment. Please make sure you started some remote controls which registered as offering this environment.
exception.full-stacktrace: java.lang.RuntimeException: Could not start Selenium session: ERROR: Could not find any remote control providing the 'Firefox on Windows' environment.
